text: The Hungarian Fencing Championships () are an annual outdoor fencing competition organized and supervised by the Hungarian Fencing Federation, which serves as the Hungarian national championships for the sport. ==Champions== ===Foil=== Target are of foil. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: left;" |- !rowspan=2|Year !colspan=2|Men's !colspan=2|Women's
